Meaning of Roshni. Muslim name. In Muslim, the name Roshni means-Light.. Other origins for the name Roshni include-Muslim, Indian.The name Roshni is most often used as a girl name or female name. Muslim Name Meaning-Light

[ syll. ros-hni, ro-sh-ni ] The baby girl name Roshni is pronounced R OW-SHNiy †. Roshni has its origins in the Old Persian and Sanskrit languages. From Sanskrit roots, its meaning is 'brighteners'. Roshni is a variant of Roshan (Indian, Iranian, and Urdu). Roshni is not widely used as a baby name for girls. It is not listed within the top 1000 names. Baby names that sound like Roshni include Roshnee, Roshney, Roshnie, Roshny, Ra'naa, Rachna (Indian), Raegan (English), Ragan, Ragen, Ragene, Raggan, Rajnee, Rajney, Rajni, Rajnie, Rajny, Rakkon, Rakon, Rashane, and Rashaun.
